Description.Text: Rates include daily breakfast for up to 1 person for One-bedroom residences, 2 persons for Two-bedroom residences and 3 persons for Three-bedroom residences.

Located strategically on Jinma Road in the central business district of the Dalian Development Area, Somerset Grand Central Dalian is the ideal residence for you, promising both comfort and convenience. The residence offers close proximity to a wealth of business, dining, shopping, entertainment and leisure options. The stunning Golden Pebble Beach is also within easy reach. The residence is easily accessible via a 5-min drive from the light rail system that links you to downtown, a 20-min drive to the hi-speed railway station and a 35-min drive from the international airport.

A perfect home for executives and their families, each of our 195 residences, ranging from one-bedroom to three bedroom apartments and penthouses, is furnished in a warm and elegant style featuring a spacious living room, with a separate dining area and a fully equipped kitchen that is any homemaker's dream. A 24-hour security system also ensures a safe living environment for you and your family.
Restaurant - Type-Buffet Cuisine - Continental Breakfast Hours of operation - Breakfast 0630 to 1000.
